Entries.1655059/F/e 10/f Biscuit 2500 Maru 2500/: jaunty/11 33/farmer 15 40 0 Maru -1000 -1000 2 Biscuit 10 30 1/skippable/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 12 30 2/changeName robot [LocalizedText Mods\DolphINaF.ExtraPortraits\Strings:Name.robot]/showFrame robot 4/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "Hey! Wakey wakey, you big toaster! "/jump Biscuit/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/emote Biscuit 40/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Um...Toaster-thing? Are you okay? $7"/pause 500/playSound robotSoundEffects/showFrame robot 8/jump Biscuit/pause 500/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit " Movement! That's a good thing, right? For a minute I thought you might be busted or something."/showFrame robot 1/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 1 2 9 10 9 0/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/speak robot " Scanning...An organic life-form. It seems I have returned to where I was created."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "I don't know what you said, but I'm glad you're okay, Toaster! $10"/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/speak robot " Canine, I am not a Toaster. I am MarILDA, a synthetic lifeform created by Maru."/pause 500/speak Biscuit "MarILDA? $9#$b# I hope I said that right! I'm Biscuit! and- $10"/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/beginSimultaneousCommand/emote Biscuit 16/jump Biscuit/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Wait, you can understand me?! How? Hardly anyone can understand me?! $7"/pause 500/speak robot " I have scanned many linguistic sound banks and processed the canine lexicon. I am simply repeating the knowledge I have accumulated and applying it to my programming."/pause 500/emote Biscuit 40/pause 1000/speak Biscuit ".....Linguine sound bank what? $7"/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/speak Biscuit "Nevermind. Maybe I'm just not good at Toaster Talk. "/showFrame robot 1/beginSimultaneousCommand/shake robot 2000/speak robot " Foolish Biscuit! It is not called "Toaster-talk". My neuro-processor is indicating that I should be offended by this statement! "/endSimultaneousCommand/showFrame robot 7/speak Biscuit " Oh, sorry. I didn't mean to upset you Toa- I mean MarILDA $4"/pause 500/speak robot " This response is acceptable. I shall forgive you."/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Oh good! Now what brings you to the valley, friend?"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/speak robot " I require assistance with maintenance and repair. Maru should be sufficient to assist me with that task."/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Oh, you need Maru? Just give me a second. This usually gets her attention."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/textAboveHead Biscuit "MARUUUUUUU"/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Now, wait for it...."/emote Biscuit 40/emote robot 40/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 12 26/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "BISCUIT! HOW CAN WE WORK IN HERE WITH YOU HOWLING LI-"/beginSimultaneousCommand/showFrame Maru 27/textAboveHead Maru "MarILDA!!"/jump Maru/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/speed Maru 5/move Maru 2 0 1/speed Maru 5/move Maru 0 4 2/faceDirection Maru 3/showFrame robot 0/pause 500/speak Maru "I'm so happy you're back! It's good to see you again! $h #$b# It looks like you need some repair though. Let's see about getting you fixed up!"/pause 500/speak robot " My gratitude, Maru. I have acquired a large amount of information I wish to discuss."/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 16 17 18 19/pause 500/animate Maru true true 200 20 21 22 23 22 21 20 19 18/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 0 7/pause 500/speak robot " My gratitude to you as well, Biscuit. Thank you for your assistance."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/speak Biscuit "No problem! Glad I could help you Toa- I mean MarILDA."/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 19 18 17 16/pause 500/stopAnimation Maru 12/showFrame Maru 12/speak Maru " Oh... $s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/showFrame Maru 26/pause 500/speak Maru "I'm sorry I yelled at you, Biscuit. I thought you were just being noisy when all you wanted to do was get my attention.... $s"/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/move Biscuit 0 1 2/beginSimultaneousCommand/move Biscuit 4 0 1/animate robot false false 200 1 0/endSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection Biscuit 0/speak Biscuit "Don't be sad, Maru. I know you didn't mean it...... $2"/pause 500/playSound dog_bark/jump Biscuit/showFrame Maru 0/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Now I can tell everyone I met a talking toaster! They are going to be soooo jealous! I'mma go right now! $10"/speed Biscuit 6/advancedMove Biscuit false -10 0 0 -20/pause 6000/stopAdvancedMoves/showFrame robot 1/speak robot " ... I am not a toaster...."/pause 500/emote Maru 8/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "Hmm? What was that MarILDA?"/pause 500/globalFade 0.005 true/speak robot " ....Nothing....."/pause 500/viewport -1000 -1000/mail marubot/end

jaunty/11 33/farmer 15 40 0 Maru -1000 -1000 2 Biscuit 10 30 1/skippable/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 12 30 2/changeName robot [LocalizedText Mods\DolphINaF.ExtraPortraits\Strings:Name.robot]/showFrame robot 4/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "嘿！大面包机睁开你的眼睛！"/jump Biscuit/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/emote Biscuit 40/pause 500/speak Biscuit "额...是烤糊了吗？你还好吗？$7"/pause 500/playSound robotSoundEffects/showFrame robot 8/jump Biscuit/pause 500/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "动起来了！那是件好事吧，应该？刚刚我以为你是炸开了还是怎么样。"/showFrame robot 1/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 1 2 9 10 9 0/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/speak robot "正在扫描...发现有机生命体。疑似回到创生地。"/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "你还好吗我听不懂你在说什么，烤面包机！$10"/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/speak robot "犬科动物，我并非烤面包机。我叫玛丽尔达，是由玛鲁博士创造的合成生命体。"/pause 500/speak Biscuit "玛丽尔达？$9#$b#我希望我发音对了！我叫小点心！还有--$10"/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/beginSimultaneousCommand/emote Biscuit 16/jump Biscuit/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/speak Biscuit "等会你能听懂我说的话？！怎么会？几乎没人能听懂我说话？！$7"/pause 500/speak robot "我的词库集成所有犬科词汇。仅仅只是简单的运用和处理，它已经集成在我的运行程式中。"/pause 500/emote Biscuit 40/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "...什么咕嗤城市？$7"/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/speak Biscuit "别在意。我只是不太擅长烤面包机的语言。"/showFrame robot 1/beginSimultaneousCommand/shake robot 2000/speak robot "愚蠢的犬科动物！它不叫 "烤面包语"。我的神经网络提示这是一种冒犯！"/endSimultaneousCommand/showFrame robot 7/speak Biscuit "哦，对不起我无意冒犯，烤面包--不对，玛丽尔达。$4"/pause 500/speak robot "反应已处理。我能无视这段话。"/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "哦好吧！什么风把你吹到星露谷里来了，朋友？"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/speak robot "我的机体需要维护和保养。玛鲁博士会帮助我完成这项任务。"/pause 500/speak Biscuit "哦你的意思是找玛鲁？给我点时间。这样就能引起她的注意了。"/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/textAboveHead Biscuit "玛啊阿鲁！"/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "现在只要静静等待会..."/emote Biscuit 40/emote robot 40/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 12 26/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "小点心！你这么吵我还怎么认真工作-"/beginSimultaneousCommand/showFrame Maru 27/textAboveHead Maru "玛丽尔达！！"/jump Maru/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/speed Maru 5/move Maru 2 0 1/speed Maru 5/move Maru 0 4 2/faceDirection Maru 3/showFrame robot 0/pause 500/speak Maru "很高兴你能回来！再次相见！$h#$b#看上去你需要修复。让我们看看该怎么处理！"/pause 500/speak robot "非常感谢玛鲁。我获得许多信息需要跟你探讨。"/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 16 17 18 19/pause 500/animate Maru true true 200 20 21 22 23 22 21 20 19 18/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 0 7/pause 500/speak robot "同样感谢你，小点心。感谢你的帮助。"/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/speak Biscuit "小事一桩！帮助你是我应尽的义务 烤面包-我是说玛丽尔达。"/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 19 18 17 16/pause 500/stopAnimation Maru 12/showFrame Maru 12/speak Maru "哦...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/showFrame Maru 26/pause 500/speak Maru "刚才朝你吼真不好意思，小点心。我以为你是噪音扰民，其实是想吸引我的注意...$s"/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/move Biscuit 0 1 2/beginSimultaneousCommand/move Biscuit 4 0 1/animate robot false false 200 1 0/endSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection Biscuit 0/speak Biscuit "别难过，玛鲁。我知道你不是那个意思...$2"/pause 500/playSound dog_bark/jump Biscuit/showFrame Maru 0/pause 500/speak Biscuit "现在我要跟大家炫耀我遇到了一台会说话的烤面包机！他们一定会嫉妒疯了！我已经迫不及待了！$10"/speed Biscuit 6/advancedMove Biscuit false -10 0 0 -20/pause 6000/stopAdvancedMoves/showFrame robot 1/speak robot "...我不是烤面包机..."/pause 500/emote Maru 8/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "蛤？怎么了玛丽尔达？"/pause 500/globalFade 0.005 true/speak robot "...没事..."/pause 500/viewport -1000 -1000/mail marubot/end

jaunty/11 33/farmer 15 40 0 Maru -1000 -1000 2 Biscuit 10 30 1/skippable/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 12 30 2/changeName robot [LocalizedText Mods\DolphINaF.ExtraPortraits\Strings:Name.robot]/showFrame robot 4/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "Привет! Просыпайся, просыпайся, ты, большой тостер! "/jump Biscuit/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/emote Biscuit 40/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Эм... тостер? Ты в порядке? $7"/pause 500/playSound robotSoundEffects/showFrame robot 8/jump Biscuit/pause 500/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit " Движение! Это хорошо, правда? На минуту я подумала, что тебя, возможно, арестовали или что-то такое."/showFrame robot 1/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 1 2 9 10 9 0/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/speak robot "МарИЛьДА: Сканирую...Органическая форма жизни. Кажется, я вернулась туда, где была создана."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Я не знаю, что ты сказала, но я рада, что с тобой всё в порядке, Тостер! $10"/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/speak robot "Собака, я не тостер. Я МарИЛьДА, синтетическая форма жизни, созданная Мару."/pause 500/speak Biscuit "МарИЛьДА? $9#$b# Надеюсь, я сказала это правильно! Я Бисквит! и- $10"/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/beginSimultaneousCommand/emote Biscuit 16/jump Biscuit/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Подожди, ты можешь меня понять?! Как? Вряд ли кто-нибудь сможет понять меня?! $7"/pause 500/speak robot "Я просмотрела множество лингвистических звуковых банков и обработала собачий лексикон. Я просто повторяю накопленные мной знания и применяю их к своему программированию."/pause 500/emote Biscuit 40/pause 1000/speak Biscuit ".....банк звуков лингви.., что? $7"/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/speak Biscuit "Не берите в голову. Может быть, я просто не сильна в разговорах о тостерах. "/showFrame robot 1/beginSimultaneousCommand/shake robot 2000/speak robot "Глупая Бисквит! Это не называется "Разговоры о тостере". Мой нейропроцессор указывает, что я должна быть оскорблена этим заявлением! "/endSimultaneousCommand/showFrame robot 7/speak Biscuit " О, извини, я не хотела тебя расстраивать тос.., то есть... я имею в виду МарИЛьДА $4"/pause 500/speak robot "Такой ответ приемлем. Я прощаю тебя."/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "О, хорошо! Итак, что привело тебя в долину, друг?"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/speak robot "Мне нужна помощь в техническом обслуживании и ремонте. Мару должно быть достаточно, чтобы помочь мне с этой задачей."/pause 500/speak Biscuit "О, тебе нужна Мару? Дай мне секунду. Обычно это привлекает её внимание."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/textAboveHead Biscuit "МАРУ-У-У-У-У-У"/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Теперь жди...."/emote Biscuit 40/emote robot 40/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 12 26/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "БИСКВИТ! КАК МЫ МОЖЕМ РАБОТАТЬ, КОГДА ТЫ ВОЕШЬ-"/beginSimultaneousCommand/showFrame Maru 27/textAboveHead Maru "МарИЛьДА!!"/jump Maru/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/speed Maru 5/move Maru 2 0 1/speed Maru 5/move Maru 0 4 2/faceDirection Maru 3/showFrame robot 0/pause 500/speak Maru "Я так рада, что ты вернулась! Рада снова тебя видеть! $h #$b# Однако, похоже, тебе нужен некоторый ремонт. Давай подумаем, как привести тебя в порядок!"/pause 500/speak robot "Моя благодарность Мару. Я получила большой объем информации, которую хотела бы обсудить."/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 16 17 18 19/pause 500/animate Maru true true 200 20 21 22 23 22 21 20 19 18/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 0 7/pause 500/speak robot "Я так же благодарна тебе, Бисквит. Спасибо за твою помощь."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/speak Biscuit "Нет проблем! рада, что смогла помочь тебе, тос... я имею в виду МарИЛьДА."/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 19 18 17 16/pause 500/stopAnimation Maru 12/showFrame Maru 12/speak Maru " О... $s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/showFrame Maru 26/pause 500/speak Maru "Прости, что накричала на тебя, Бисквит. Я думала, ты просто шумишь, хотя ты просто хотела привлечь моё внимание.... $s"/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/move Biscuit 0 1 2/beginSimultaneousCommand/move Biscuit 4 0 1/animate robot false false 200 1 0/endSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection Biscuit 0/speak Biscuit "Не грусти, Мару. Я знаю, ты не это имела в виду...... $2"/pause 500/playSound dog_bark/jump Biscuit/showFrame Maru 0/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Теперь я могу всем рассказать, что встретила говорящий тостер! Они будут та-а-ак завидовать! Я ухожу прямо сейчас! $10"/speed Biscuit 6/advancedMove Biscuit false -10 0 0 -20/pause 6000/stopAdvancedMoves/showFrame robot 1/speak robot "... Я не тостер...."/pause 500/emote Maru 8/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "Хм-м? что это было МарИЛьДА?"/pause 500/globalFade 0.005 true/speak robot "....Ничего....."/pause 500/viewport -1000 -1000/mail marubot/end

jaunty/11 33/farmer 15 40 0 Maru -1000 -1000 2 Biscuit 10 30 1/skippable/addTemporaryActor robot 35 42 12 30 2/changeName robot [LocalizedText Mods\DolphINaF.ExtraPortraits\Strings:Name.robot]/showFrame robot 4/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/pause 1000/speak Biscuit "¡Oye! ¡Despierta, gran tostadora!"/jump Biscuit/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/emote Biscuit 40/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Um... ¿Cosa-tostadora? ¿Estás bien?$7"/pause 500/playSound robotSoundEffects/showFrame robot 8/jump Biscuit/pause 500/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "¡Movimiento! Eso es bueno, ¿verdad? Por un minuto pensé que podrías estar atrapado o algo así."/showFrame robot 1/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 1 2 9 10 9 0/pause 500/showFrame robot 7/speak robot "Escaneando... Una forma de vida orgánica. Parece que he vuelto al lugar donde fui creada."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "No sé qué has dicho, pero me alegro de que estés bien, Tostadora.$10"/showFrame robot 7/pause 500/speak robot "Canino, no soy una Tostadora. Soy MarILDA, una forma de vida sintética creada por Maru."/pause 500/speak Biscuit "¿MarILDA?$9#$b#¡Espero haberlo dicho bien! ¡Soy Biscuit! y...$10"/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/beginSimultaneousCommand/emote Biscuit 16/jump Biscuit/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Espera, ¡¿puedes entenderme?! ¿¡Cómo!? ¡Casi nadie puede entenderme!$7"/pause 500/speak robot "He escaneado muchos bancos de sonidos lingüísticos y procesado el léxico canino. Simplemente repito los conocimientos que he acumulado y los aplico a mi programación."/pause 500/emote Biscuit 40/pause 1000/speak Biscuit ".....Banco de sonido linguine ¿qué?$7"/animate Biscuit false true 200 22 23/speak Biscuit "No importa. Tal vez no soy buena hablando con tostadoras."/showFrame robot 1/beginSimultaneousCommand/shake robot 2000/speak robot "¡Tonta Biscuit! No se llama "charla de tostadora". ¡Mi neuroprocesador me está indicando que debería ofenderme por esta afirmación!"/endSimultaneousCommand/showFrame robot 7/speak Biscuit "Oh, lo siento. No quise molestarte Tost- quiero decir MarILDA.$4"/pause 500/speak robot "Esta respuesta es aceptable. Te perdonaré."/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/animate Biscuit false false 200 32 33 34/pause 500/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "¡Oh, bien! ¿Qué te trae por el valle, amiga?"/pause 500/showFrame robot 1/speak robot "Necesito ayuda con el mantenimiento y la reparación. Maru debería ser suficiente para ayudarme con esa tarea."/pause 500/speak Biscuit "¿Necesitas a Maru? Dame un segundo. Esto suele llamar su atención."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/textAboveHead Biscuit "MARUUUUUUU"/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Ahora, espera..."/emote Biscuit 40/emote robot 40/pause 500/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 12 26/faceDirection Maru 2/speak Maru "¡BISCUIT! ¿CÓMO PODEMOS TRABAJAR AQUÍ CONTIGO AULLANDO LI-"/beginSimultaneousCommand/showFrame Maru 27/textAboveHead Maru "¡¡MarILDA!!"/jump Maru/endSimultaneousCommand/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/speed Maru 5/move Maru 2 0 1/speed Maru 5/move Maru 0 4 2/faceDirection Maru 3/showFrame robot 0/pause 500/speak Maru "Me alegro mucho de que hayas vuelto. Me alegro de volver a verte.$h#$b#Aunque parece que necesitas alguna reparación. Vamos a ver cómo arreglarte."/pause 500/speak robot "Mi agradecimiento, Maru. He adquirido una gran cantidad de información que deseo discutir."/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 16 17 18 19/pause 500/animate Maru true true 200 20 21 22 23 22 21 20 19 18/pause 500/animate robot false false 200 0 7/pause 500/speak robot "Mi agradecimiento a ti también, Biscuit. Gracias por tu ayuda."/stopAnimation Biscuit 34/playSound dog_bark/animate Biscuit false false 200 34 35 17 17 35 34/pause 1000/animate Biscuit false true 200 34 35/speak Biscuit "¡No hay problema! Me alegro de haber podido ayudarte Tost- quiero decir MarILDA."/pause 500/animate Maru true false 200 19 18 17 16/pause 500/stopAnimation Maru 12/showFrame Maru 12/speak Maru "Oh...$s"/pause 500/faceDirection Maru 2/showFrame Maru 26/pause 500/speak Maru "Siento haberte gritado, Biscuit. Creí que sólo hacías ruido cuando lo único que querías era llamar mi atención...$s"/pause 500/stopAnimation Biscuit 4/showFrame Biscuit 4/move Biscuit 0 1 2/beginSimultaneousCommand/move Biscuit 4 0 1/animate robot false false 200 1 0/endSimultaneousCommand/faceDirection Biscuit 0/speak Biscuit "No estés triste, Maru. Sé que no lo decías en serio...$2"/pause 500/playSound dog_bark/jump Biscuit/showFrame Maru 0/pause 500/speak Biscuit "Ahora puedo decirle a todo el mundo que conocí una tostadora parlante. Se van a poner muy celosos. ¡Me voy ahora mismo!$10"/speed Biscuit 6/advancedMove Biscuit false -10 0 0 -20/pause 6000/stopAdvancedMoves/showFrame robot 1/speak robot "...no soy una tostadora..."/pause 500/emote Maru 8/faceDirection Maru 3/speak Maru "¿Hmm? ¿Qué fue eso MarILDA?"/pause 500/globalFade 0.005 true/speak robot "...Nada..."/pause 500/viewport -1000 -1000/mail marubot/end
